p: Acute phototoxic effects (e.g. erythema, oedemas and blisters) have been observed after oral exposure to furocoumarins in combination with sunlight or UVA light in doses, such as 50 mg 8‚ÄêMOP (0.83 mg/kg bw for 60 kg bw) or 45 mg psoralen (0.75 mg/kg bw for 60 kg bw) (Fitzpatrick and Pathak, 1984; Ljunggren, 1990, as referenced in SKLM, 2006).
